plot: Two incompetent private detectives are hired to clear the name of a friend accused of robbery and murder. They wind up in a seedy Paris night club, and get into a fight, but finally prove their friend's innocence.
title: Let's Have a Murder
plot_es: Two incompetent private detectives are hired to clear the name of a friend accused of robbery and murder. They wind up in a seedy Paris night club, and get into a fight, but finally prove their friend's innocence.
plot_en: Two incompetent private detectives are hired to clear the name of a friend accused of robbery and murder. They wind up in a seedy Paris night club, and get into a fight, but finally prove their friend's innocence.
